instance_template:
loc("BaseCamp"; "Fork1"; "Fork2"; "OutpostX"; "OutpostY"; "RelayStation").
edge("BaseCamp", "Fork1").
edge("BaseCamp", "Fork2").
edge("Fork1", "OutpostX").
edge("Fork1", "RelayStation").
edge("Fork2", "OutpostY").
edge("Fork2", "RelayStation").
time(0..10).
generator:
1 { at(L, T) : loc(L) } 1 :- time(T).
1 { inspect_at("OutpostX", T) : time(T) } 1.
1 { inspect_at("OutpostY", T) : time(T) } 1.
0 { inspect_at("RelayStation", T) : time(T) } 1.
move(T) :- at(L1, T), at(L2, T+1), L1 != L2.

hard_constraints.description: The rover is required to occupy the BaseCamp location at the initial temporal index.
Transitions between distinct locations are restricted to pairs defined by the adjacency matrix of the terrain.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- at(L1, T), at(L2, T+1), L1 != L2, not edge(L1, L2), not edge(L2, L1).

hard_constraints.description: An inspection operation requires the rover to be physically present at the target location during the designated time step.
Temporal continuity of location is mandatory during the execution of an inspection task, necessitating a stationary state for one full minute.
The cumulative energy consumption, calculated as the total number of movements between distinct locations, must not exceed the maximum storage capacity of six units.
An inspection at the RelayStation is permissible only if the remaining energy capacity exceeds two units upon the conclusion of all mandatory scanning tasks.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- inspect_at("RelayStation", _), T_max = #max { T+1 : inspect_at(L, T), L != "RelayStation" }, #count { Tm : move(Tm), Tm < T_max } >= 4.

soft_constraints.description: A penalty is associated with the failure to collect bonus diagnostic data from the RelayStation, incentivizing its inclusion in the rover's itinerary.
